channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole just outside Revamp, 1st March
item.description:
Large pothole outside Revamp. I did originally report this a year ago! Please can this be sorted before it does damage to someone's tyres - thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Great Norwood Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amounts of litter again, 1st March
item.description:
Particularly bad here - please could it be cleaned
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Castle Hill Cottage A417, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 1st March
item.description:
The verges either side of this road are covered with litter - it's really horrible. Please can it be cleaned up and signs put out warning of CCTV - at least this might deter some people. thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Brimpsfield
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amounts of litter, 1st March
item.description:
The A417 verges are covered with litter either side but this area is one of the worst. It is v bad for the environment and looks awful - please can it be cleaned up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of litter dumped, 1st March
item.description:
Large amount of rubbish dumped again - this seems to be a favoured spot for flytippers
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bartlow Leckhampton Hill, Leckhampton Hill
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge potholes, 1st March
item.description:
Massive potholes, please fix
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coberley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a large deep pothole that is getting bigger and deeper., 1st March
item.description:
The hole has been here for several months. The hole is in front of No 8, Chelmsford Avenue. When vehicles hit the pothole it sprays large pebbles and debris onto the footpath which is a hazard to pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 Chelmsford Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked road drain, 1st March
item.description:
For some reason a road drain has been covered with a patch of tarmac. This causes a large puddle to form covering half the lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): White Towers Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barriers and cones, 1st March
item.description:
Barriers and cones left around a pothole are causing traffic to drive onto soft verges. Under the soft verge there is the former tarmac lane surface. The soil could be removed to provide a suitable running surface.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on crest of slope, 1st March
item.description:
Pothole is causing vehicles to drive off the lane surface
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unmaintained hedge, 1st March
item.description:
An uncut hedge is causing traffic on a narrow lane entrance to be pushed across the lane into oncoming traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bentham Cottage Shurdington Road, Bentham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti tags, 28th February
item.description:
Graffiti tag on wall of jubilee flats and 53 Swindon Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Jupiter House, 47 Swindon Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Flytipping, 28th February
item.description:
Mattresses dumped on the side of the road at the lower part of Frog Furlong Lane, Innsworth.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Frog Furlong Lane, Down Hatherley

item.title: Deep potholes cause whole house to vibrate when traffic goes over, 28th February
item.description:
This series of potholes has been getting worse throughout the winter. As larger vehicles go over them it causes the whole house to vibrate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 165a Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very severe pothole, makes the vehicle dip and roll suddenly.right when about to exit to A417 s/bound from M5 at jcn 11a s/bound., 27th February
item.description:
Big pothole, causes vehicle instability at motorway speed. Still has not been addressed. Could potentially cause damage to vehicles with smaller diameter wheels. Could potentially cause temporary distraction to concentration as exiting motorway to A-road sliproad.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight out, 27th February
item.description:
Streetlight bulb has been out for at least 2 to 3 weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Silverstone Vicarage Lane, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A new load which has been dumped, 27th February
item.description:
This is a constant problem here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 46 Swindon Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Dog waste bin damaged, 27th February
item.description:
It looks like this bin might need replacing, as half of it is missing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Ashbrittle Road, Hucclecote

item.title: Cars parked on footpath, 26th February
item.description:
This an ongoing and permanent problem. As can be seen in the photographs these cars are totally parked on the footpath blocking pedestrian access and damaging the footpath surface. This is the case every day of the working week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Unit c Malmesbury Road, Kingsditch Trading Estate
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over hanging hedge, 26th February
item.description:
The Hedge is so wide the pavement is reduced to half its normal width so people are walking on the verge. This also applies to many pavements in Benhall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Benhall Playgroup Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
